title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 21.81 - Payment by marketers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 21.81 - Payment by marketers

State Regulations

Each marketer and each collecting cooperative which has
arranged to make the reports and payments with respect to the milk of producers
shall, on or before the 15th day of each month, pay to the commissioner as
trustee, the amounts deducted from producers on pool milk received during the
preceding month in accordance with the terms of section
21.80
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
21.81

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
